title: [W]Changing legal representative
h1: [W]Do you want to change your legal representative?
legalRepresentativeChange: [W]Yes, I confirm I want to change my legal representative.
legalRepresentativeRemove: [W]Yes, I confirm I wish to remove my legal representative and continue my case representing myself.

legalRep.backEndError: [W]There was an error while removing your legal representative. Please try again. If this error persists please contact support.
